Implement a Community-Led Composting Program: 	* Create a network of community gardens and composting sites where residents can bring their organic waste.
Invent a Portable, Self-Sustaining Waste-to-Energy Device: 	* Design a compact, battery-powered device that can convert waste into energy on-site.
Develop a Smart Waste Sorting System: 	* Create an AI-powered waste sorting system that can identify and categorize different types of waste.
Create a Waste-to-Product Marketplace: 	* Establish an online platform where individuals can sell their waste as a raw material for product creation.
Establish a Waste-to-Energy Bank: 	* Create a financial incentive program that rewards individuals and businesses for reducing their waste.
